name: Noto Sans Lao UI
description: Noto is a global font collection for writing in all modern and ancient languages. Noto Sans Lao UI is an unmodulated (“sans serif”) design in the more modern, loopless variant of the Southeast Asian Lao script, suitable for app and website user interfaces in the Lao script. It has multiple weights and widths, and 118 glyphs.
author: Google
